text: Piloctenus is a genus of wandering spiders first described by A. Henrard & Rudy Jocqué in 2017. ==Species== it contains four species: *Piloctenus gryseelsi Henrard & Jocqué, 2017 — Guinea *Piloctenus haematostoma Jocqué & Henrard, 2017 — Guinea *Piloctenus mirificus (Arts, 1912) — Togo, Ivory Coast, Guinea *Piloctenus pilosus (Thorell, 1899) — West, Central Africa ==References== ==External links== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Ctenidae
title: Piloctenus
